alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 10:32PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Box Butte, northeastern Scotts Bluff, northern Morrill and southeastern Sioux Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 932 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Lake Minatare to near Angora to near The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Kilpatrick Lake, Berea, Alliance Airport, Angora and The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
